arts.ttl: Allegri confirms Athekame or Bartesaghi will start against Juve – choice is obvious
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Massimiliano Allegri confirmed earlier today that one of Zachary Athekame and Davide Bartesaghi will start on Milan’s left flank against Juventus tomorrow. After playing the same left wing-back in the first five league games, Allegri will be forced to make a change tomorrow as Pervis Estupinan is suspended. The Ecuadorian was sent off in the […] The post Allegri confirms Athekame or Bartesaghi will start against Juve – choice is obvious appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: GdS: Leao and Nkunku could cause headache for Juve as Allegri eyes subs
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Massimiliano Allegri has made it clear that substitutions make a huge difference, and in Juventus-Milan, they could definitely play a big part in the proceedings. In the first five league games this season, Allegri has received quite a lot of praise for his in-game changes. arts.ttl: Allegri previews ‘great’ Juve-Milan clash and discusses XI doubts: “Bartesaghi or Athekame”
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller On the eve of the clash between AC Milan and Juventus, Massimiliano Allegri spoke to the media at the usual press conference. Milan are currently flying high after four consecutive wins, beating Napoli last time out, but a tough clash is now on the cards for the Rossoneri: Juve away from home. arts.ttl: GdS: Allegri insists on Gimenez for Juve vs. Milan – character plays key role
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Massimiliano Allegri has decided to rely on Santiago Gimenez in the No.9 role against Juventus, as highlighted by a report, and the Mexican remains eager to prove himself. arts.ttl: Milan boss Allegri eyes the usual defensive line in match vs Juventus
arts.sum: The tests Fikayo Tomori underwent after the muscle issue suffered last Sunday against Napoli fortunately showed only a slight adductor strain, which the defender recovered from in a few days. Yesterday, the English player returned to group training and will therefore be fully available to Massimiliano Allegri for tomorrow night’s trip to Juventus. Milan with […]
